mapper.select: SELECT a.bid, a.title, a.contents, a.reg_dt as regDt, a.read_count as readCount FROM board a ORDER BY a.bid DESC
SELECT a.bid, a.title, a.contents, a.reg_dt as regDt, a.read_count as readCount FROM board a WHERE a.bid = #{bid}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board( title, contents, reg_dt, read_count) VALUES ( #{title}, #{contents}, now(), 0);
mapper.update: UPDATE board a SET a.title = #{title}, a.contents = #{contents}, a.reg_dt = NOW() WHERE a.bid = #{bid};
UPDATE board a SET a.read_count = read_count + 1 WHERE a.bid = #{bid};
